rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0001
rows.name:
So...we have this extermination order up around the northern
coast. Some violent indigens that got a little too touchy-feely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0002
rows.name: Apparently banged up a few Outfitters—pretty standard stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0003
rows.name:
We're all prepped and about to head out, and then BAM—
another job comes in from Commander Tanktop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0004
rows.name: I mean, I know we're the best and all, but seriously...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0005
rows.name: Sounds rough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
All right—you take the indigens,
and we'll take Vandham's job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0007
rows.name: Thank you, Colonel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Let me walk you through the intel. These images
I'm about to show you are from a probe in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Is that a ship of some sort?
Can't really tell from that distance...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yeah. It's hard to grasp the scale
with such long-range images.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0011
rows.name: Whatever it is, it's getting hammered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0012
rows.name: Friends must do something to help poor ship![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0013
rows.name: Tatsu will not stand for this injustice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0014
rows.name: Says the one guy who never actually fights anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0015
rows.name:
It's difficult to say for sure from this,
but that craft on the right...I bet it's Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0016
rows.name: It shares aspects of their mech design.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Our thoughts exactly. The assignment is
to get there and confirm one way or another. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0018
rows.name:
We don't know who built the ship that's under attack,
but as the Commander so elegantly put it,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0019
rows.name: "Our enemy's enemies might be our pals!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0020
rows.name: I'm inclined to agree.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0021
rows.name:
If we're gonna settle here on Mira,
we'll need all the friends we can get.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0022
rows.name: That's for sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0023
rows.name: All right, thanks for the info. We'll take it from here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0024
rows.name: Thank you, Colonel.[ST:wait ]
